title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior project Engineer Posts
description: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has recently declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply online for these posts...
